title: Khawvel suala bo hnu tlan chhuak leh turin
lyrics:
Khawvel suala bo hnu tlan chhuak leh turin,
Pathianin a Fapa mal neih chhun min pe;
A tlan sa, suala boten nunna kawng an hriat theih nan,
Thilpeka rawngbawl turin Lalpan min ko.

Pe rawh u, tichuan, pekin in awm ang,
Pekah Pathian i hnehnan thei lo vang;
Pathianin mihring lei a ba ngai lo,
Malsawmna hnar a lo ni si.

Ringtute u, thupek khauh tak mai kan hmu,
"Kal ula, Chanchin Tha hril rawh u," a ti.
Kal chhuak thei lote pawhin, mawhphurhna lian tak kan nei,
Thilpeka rawngbawl turin Lalpan min ko.

Ringtute u, khawnge ro in khawl khawm dawn?
Thlarau bova i khawl khawm chu i hum ang;
Rinnaa i pek tur chu Lalpan a nghak reng a ni,
"Eng zatah nge min rin ngam dawn le?" a ti.

Ka lo hre ta Lalpa, i sawmna aw hi,
Kristian tin missionary atan min ko;
Ka hlan che, ka neih zawng leh ka taksa, ka nunna nen,
I ta ka ni, thisenin min lei tawh si.
